title: Girls & Panzer: Gekitou! Maginot-sen desu!!
original_name: ガールズ＆パンツァー 激闘！マジノ戦ですっ!!
sinopse: Side story taking place between the match against St. Gloriana and the beginning of the Senshadou Nationals. It centers around a training match not shown in the anime, between Ooarai Girls High School and the Maginot Girl's Academy.
